JavaDoq: PaliHarvardKyotoToLatin.java   
01 package de.pali.transliteration;
02 
03 
04 import java.util.*;
05 
06 import de.general.transliteration.ITransliterator;
07 
08 
09 /**
10  *
11  * @author knauth
12  */
13 public class PaliHarvardKyotoToLatin implements ITransliterator
14 {
15 
16     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17     // Constants
18     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
19 
20     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
21     // Variables
22     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23 
24     private static final HashMap<String, String> transliterationSchema;
25 
26     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27     // Constructors
28     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
29 
30     /**
31      * Constructor.
32      */
33     public PaliHarvardKyotoToLatin()
34     {
35     }
36 
37     static {
38         transliterationSchema = new HashMap<String, String>();
39         transliterationSchema.put("A", "Ä?");
40         transliterationSchema.put("I", "Ä«");
41         transliterationSchema.put("U", "Å«");
42         transliterationSchema.put("L", "á¸·");
43         transliterationSchema.put("M", "á¹ƒ");
44         transliterationSchema.put("H", "á¸¥");
45         transliterationSchema.put("G", "á¹…");
46         transliterationSchema.put("J", "Ã±");
47         transliterationSchema.put("T", "á¹­");
48         transliterationSchema.put("D", "á¸?");
49         transliterationSchema.put("N", "á¹‡");
50         transliterationSchema.put("S", "á¹£");
51     }
52 
53     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
54     // Methods
55     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
56 
57     @Override
58     public String fromSchema()
59     {
60         return "HKC";
61     }
62 
63     @Override
64     public String toSchema()
65     {
66         return "RL";
67     }
68 
69     @Override
70     public String transliterate(String text)
71     {
72         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
73         for (char c : text.toCharArray()) {
74             String x = transliterationSchema.get("" + c);
75             if (x != null) {
76                 sb.append(x);
77             } else {
78                 sb.append(c);
79             }
80         }
81         return sb.toString();
82     }
83 
84 }
